content.detailedDescription: At the time of sighting we where outside grilling food and enjoying the night hen we noticed a glowing sphere as we watched it my girlfriend said look there is another  so we watched them and they kept appearing from the south west at a distance of about 30 seconds apart all following the last and as they came over the building a few seconds later they seemed to just disappear around the same spot as the other they looked as if they where a perfect sphere that resembled a fire but without the flames or smoke
content.summary: 6 to 7 fire like spheres following one another from a se to nw direction

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside and started to look up as i always do.  i saw a white flash from the corner of my eye, then nothing.  as i walked out onto my porch i saw an oval shape coming from my left.  i looked up and saw an oval shape a little larger than a basketball.  i thought it was a meteor, but it was too perfect.  it changed colors from blue to green to blue to green.  there was a white stripe that went around it forming diamonds shapes.  it wasn't very high up.  it was coming down and it looked like it was going to hit somewhere close.  it was really close to me.  it went from my left to my right.  there was no sound and had nothing that looked like an exhaust plume.  i did look hazy around it.  i don't know if it hit anywhere.  i didn't hear anything.  i was stunned because i have never seen anything like it, ever.  wasn't sure whether to report it.  i did report it to a meteor site thinking that was what it was, but i heard someone on coast to coast from mufon describing other sitings around the country similar to what i saw and thought i would report it here.  i have no video or pictures.  i could draw it if needed.
content.summary: Small oval changing colors.

content.detailedDescription: While on vacation in austin texas, we had been staying at a resort to swim. while my parents were checking us in, me and my friend were anxious to take pictures to show friends. while taking pictures we did not notice anything, until we got him and started going through our picture my friend and i noticed at the top of our picture, was little circles of light, almost in a perfect oval, all the exact same size. we cannot tell if they are their own objects, or may possible be the bottom of an ufo. this picture is too weird to be explained.
content.summary: Circle if lights

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were standing on our deck monday evening 08/18/14.  she said what is that bright light?  when i looked it was gone.  then she said there it is again!  this time i got to view it for about 10 seconds before it faded behind a cloud.  it was bright as a star but moving slowly across the sky.

she then exclaimed about a minute later there it is again but it isn’t shining bright like a star.  this time we both viewed the object for at least 5 to 7 minutes.  there was no lights and no sound.  the object had a dull grey color to it and wobbled a little as it glided across the sky.  

the object had edges to it and had for lack of a better description a hump in the fuselage if you will kind of like a b-2 bomber.  i ran into the house to get my binoculars after about 6 minutes.  when i came out my wife was off of the deck and looking behind an 80 to 90 foot tree which stands in my neighbor’s yard which was now blocking her view.  when she looked behind the tree the object was gone and i waited on the deck to see if it would come out the other side but it never did.  

i am retired air force.  i have seen many types of aircrafts in my 20 years of service.  i have trained to turn off planes that have crashed and safety their guns and ejection seats and rescue the pilots in my duties as a fireman!  this was no platform i have ever seen and am truly intrigued by what we saw. 

we just moved into our home late april of this year!  on almost any given night we can go outside and see strange lights and movements in the sky!  don’t know why the activity is so prevalent at our new location but i am keeping my head to the skies.
content.summary: Viewed bright star like object which became solid

content.detailedDescription:
We was on our garden and a helicopter flying very slowly and bottom...
and at the same moment we have seen this white light flying slowly and juste front of her, an red light stationary, it was very strange !
content.summary: Red ligth stationary and after move and an big with light moving slowly

content.detailedDescription:
When we sitting at balcony we saw a dark red-orange light, the light growing first and then small. after small it losted. it was looking about 4 seconds.

we thought that undefined flying object from the other planet. becouse we saw that ufos for a long time in the evenings.

we sighted a few mins and it seems again 3 times
content.summary: Bright red-orange light in circle

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures with my nikon d3100 camera using a 18mm-55mm lens to capture lightning strikes from a storm that was heading over my residence.  the storm came in from the west and was moving east/southeast and i had my camera on continuous shooting.  a lightning bolt was discharged from the wall cloud.  it is the only time a lightning bolt came from this cloud and within a few seconds after the bolt struct, i managed to capture 2 pictures of this object.  after taking approximately 145 photos of this storm, i saw 2 pictures with a cigar shaped object following the south end of the wall cloud.  i did not see this object at all while shooting them.  it was only visible after i reviewed my photos on my computer. 
the object was a dull gray/black, solid body, no lights or windows.  there were no wings, tail or protruding areas coming from this object. the ends are rounded and fits the cigar shape perfectly.  it was approximately 30-50 ft in length (estimate) and about 700-900 ft high (again, estimate) and it followed in back of the main wall cloud that contained high winds and rain.  it moved to the east, along with the storm. it had moved hundreds of feet in less than 4 seconds.
there were no airplanes or helicopters in this area mainly because of the storm that was approaching. the only noise that was heard was the storm itself.  a few times my camera would not shoot to capture images.  so gaps were as long as 5 seconds on some of the pictures.  while most images of the storm and object were captured, fluently, i had to refocus a few times in order to get the camera to shoot some of the images (although no object was visible in those pictures).

i have included pictures of this object.  also sending the stretch between the first sighting of the object and a couple of in between pictures to show you a time sequence from the first picture of the craft to the last picture of it.  also included, are pictures of the readings on my camera at the time they were taken.

**** note ****
on my camera report, it reads the time of these pictures were in the morning.  it is suppose to read 6:25 pm...Not  am.  my camera time (am/pm) is not correct.  this storm and the object captured was in the evening, not in the morning. 

time sequence:  in between the pictures with the object clearly visible, there are 4 pictures without the object.  two pictures with the craft visible share the same time in seconds with two pictures that do not have object visible  (6:25:47 and 6:25:51). example:  picture 0468 (object visible) and 0469 (object not visible) share the same time as 6:25:47.  also, picture 0472 (no object visible) and picture 0473 (visible object) have the same time 6:25:51.  my camera does record 100th of a second time frames.  pictures 0468 and 0469 are 30/100ths of a second apart and pictures 0472 and 0473 are 60/100ths of a second apart.  

i am sending in the enhanced (contrast/brightness/cropped) pictures along with the original pictures.  the enhanced easily make the object more visible.  
adding to this report is another picture from a previous rotating wall/funnel cloud and object i captured last year (june 17, 2013), incase you want to compare the objects from this storm and the recent storm in this report.  it has an object similar to the object shaped in this recent report.  it is enhance in a sepia color picture to make this previous object more visible.  i will also send in the original photo of the 2013 object/storm.  

i can't send you all the pictures that i would like to on this report, but upon request, i will send you more time sequenced pictures or any others that i took during this event.  please let me know if you need more of them.  thank you.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object following a storm /wall cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were talking on my back patio at around 2200 saturday the 16th of august.  while talking, i noticed a glowing white light to the south of my location.  it was hovering.  then it suddenly moved to the west, in a direct line.  it then moved directly back to original location.  i watched this three times before pointing the light out to my friend.  while he was watching, we observed this 2 more times.  then all of the sudden it went on a direct descent below my sight line due to neighbors roof tops.

during this observation, we were seated and not moving.  i'm a military officer and know that this was not the movement of a helicopter or plane.  the movements were too fast and precise to be a known rotary wing aircraft.

at first glance i assumed it was an airplane.  then i noticed the unusual movements.  there also was no red or green lights, no flashing light, only the white glowing object.  it descended straight down like a spider dropping from a web.

my feelings were of shock or amazement.  i saw something that i could not explain and my friend saw the same thing.  we called our wives out and told them what we just saw.  they probably wouldn't have believed me, except that we both witnessed this.

we watched it descend until it dropped below the neighbors roof line.  it could have been between 5 and 20 miles to the south.  it was a clear night, no clouds.  shortly after the object descended out of site, an airplane flew from east to west in a nearby location of where the object had been.

i'm hoping that there were other witnesses that might have seen more.
content.summary: I witnessed a glowing, white light in the south.  it veered to the right, then returned to hover.  repeated a few times and did a hasty descent.

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed bright lights from dining room window and when i looked out saw 2 bright orange circles of lights hovering above the trees.  they had a small red dome underneath the craft.  they stayed there a few minutes and when i went to get me camera they were gone. 

i was not sleeping or dreaming.  they were so close as if they were looking at me.  i was not scared.  will draw pictures and send it if you want.  the size was bigger than a basketball. the size question is tricky.
content.summary: I saw 2 large crafts with bright orange lights hovering over street.  each craft had a small red underneath. it was hovering for about 7 minutes. i didn't see it take off because i went to get my camera and they were gone.  they were very close .I

content.detailedDescription: I was headed to the kitchen passing the front door so i took a look outside to check on dog.  as i quickly scan outside as normal it caught my eye. so i cut my porch light out so i could see better. it looked like a bright star or some sphere flashing different colors. first glance you'd think it's a plane though it didn't continue to pass by it was ideal i'm one spot.  i went back in to get a pair of banoculors as i came back it it hadn't moved much. sadly they wasn't strong enough to get a view as close as i'd liked. so i took a picture of it best i could with my phone. after about an hour it slowly rose up in an angle until you violent see it anymore.
content.summary: Scared at first

content.detailedDescription:
I was a carer of mentally handicapped children on a mini bus with a driver. we were going to collect the children from daycare and had just left ipswich suffolk uk and were stopped at a traffic light controlled roundabout at copdock on the a12, i was in the front passenger seat when i noticed an unusual object wnw of us not far of - possibly over the village of rushbrook ? i said to the driver "look at that ! what is it ?" the driver said "i'm watching traffic lin, i cannot look" i said "just there, a quick look ray " he glanced at the object and said "it's that blimp from the pub; probably broken away". just behind our position by a mile or two there is a country pub that does have an ad' blimp above it but that was not what i saw and said so, it was a different shape, the pub blimp is squat, stubby, whereas this object was more zeppelin shaped but with no features like the cockpit underneath. there were no features at all, no lights, no fins, no wings, no marking that i could see. as we moved off around the roundabout and along the a12 i watched the object out of sight and said to ray the driver that that thing is not the pub blimp ! he said we would come back to town past the pub and look later. so, about an hour and a half later we drove by the pub and saw the blimp still tethered there whereas the other object had gone. if it had have been the pub blimp that had broken away from it's tether then surely it would have taken longer than an hour and a half to retrieve it!
i asked around and looked in the local newspapers for several days after but nothing was reported. it struck me as very odd because of the shape, no cockpit, or any nav' lights flashing. it was either stationary or moving very slowly as it did not appear to move for the 4 minutes i watched it. later, ray agreed that it was not the pub blimp and it was oddly shaped. it was a uniform dark grey, almost black and had no windows.
content.summary: I saw cigar like object either stationary or moving slowly for around 4 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was at walnut hill park in new britain connecticut there was a concert at the park and above the concert shell the ufo appeared it took me a minute or so to put my phone in the camera mode i did this fast as i could.I took two photos one of which did not show anything but the second one completely shocked me.As i believe it will shock you also there were other people who witnessed it also.I am still in a bit upset because i've been having problems sending this photograph via my email.But i do have gmail.So please contact me somebody from mufon
content.summary: It seemed to hover and flash and the flashes weren't deliberate and slow it seemed to know its direction of flight

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my back yard watching the night sky. i saw 3 total. first was large red light connected to large white oval light. when an airplane came by object disappeared. 5 minutes later two white orbs appeared and both disappeared when another airplane neared them.
content.summary: Saw object directly overhead. a very large oval light at rear. plus 2 white orbs.

content.detailedDescription: It was august 11 2014 time-10:30pm..It had been raining that day pretty hard thunder and lighting was pretty intenze..Finally when it stopped me and my co workers went outside to smoke a cigarette..Few seconds passed when i looked over to my left i noticed lights just sitting in the sky ..So i immediately took out my cell phone and started recording.As i recorded i snapped pictures. by this time my two friends noticed the object in the sky also. well finally the object ufo started to slowly fading away but then my friend noticed it reapear to our right ..While we saw it to our right the first place to the left where we first saw it was slowly vanishing. .Now this all lasted 1min 6 seconds ..Ok now the ufo that appeared was moving back from us and got smaller and smaller until we couldn't see it no more...When we all looked at the video you can see more lights in the distance. .The video shows a lot more evidence to how the craft looks.
content.summary: Noticed it hovering then it reapeared to my right..But the spot where i first noticed it was slowly fading away..Like it left an in print in the sky..

content.detailedDescription: Noticed the pulsing lights on bottom of craft first.Very atypical pulsing pattern from nose to tail almost seemed a purposeful distraction in a way. very vague deltiod shape, dark,with two oval yellow lights on trailing edge or base of triangle. very minimal engine noise very muted. very slight course correction duration 2 to 3 minutes then out of visual range heading southwest
content.summary: Black triangle sighting unknown size and altitude very little noise almost random pulsating lights from nose to tail two engine type lights in back

content.detailedDescription: On 8/18/14 our family spent the evening on the beach, near the harbor, in oceanside, ca. around 9pm we all laid on our backs in the sand and were observing the stars and sky when we noticed dozens of lights passing directly overhead. they appeared to be of a very high altitude, star like, and seemed to be flashing. they were all heading south in an wobbling or zigzag motion. some were brighter than others. there was a very thick cloud cover at the time and they could only be seen in the breaks of the clouds. we observed them for about 30 minutes until the cloud cover prevented us from seeing anything else. we must have seen over a hundred of these objects. during our spotting we did notice a plane and a helicopter in the area but at much lower altitudes.
content.summary: Hundred-plus ufos heading south along california coast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting a midnight snack at dunkin donuts with a friend and we decided to pull around back next to the baseball fields at livingston park to eat in my car.
i was looking out the windshield at the stars when i thought i saw one of the stars move. i thought i was imagining it, so i asked my friend if he saw it, and once i pointed it out he quickly dismissed it as a satellite. but when the moving object began to emit different colors of light, we decided to get out of the car for a better look.
the object was the size of a bright star and although it remained in the same general area, it made rapid swooping movements and appeared to be spinning. a plane flew beneath it at one point but the object continued to move erratically. i wanted to take a picture but the object was so small it was just barely clear to our naked eyes. 
we remarked to each other when it changed colors or moved to reassure ourselves that we were not imagining it.  we stood outside the car for almost 45 minutes without even realizing how much time had passed. we eventually left, with the object still hovering as we did so.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Strange star-like object changing colors and hovering

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed an object moving through the sky which then made a 90 degree turn followed by two more 90 degree turns and an object breaking off of the original.
content.summary: Plane like with abrupt changes in direction.

content.detailedDescription: I know that its hard to believe but i don't care what anybody says i believe what i believe its almost like you have to see it for yourself honestly. i was dropping off my friend at home and when i drove away down the road toward the mississippi river in fridley mn i notice lights over the river i thought it was maybe landscapeing lights from the homes across the river but it wasn't. it was like white lights above the river it was formed like a triangle with a light at each end of the triangle shape. its was about maybe 40 to 50 feet above the river. when i first notice i was going west bound towards the river and towards the lights that i seen  then i turn south bound and it was followed me for about a half mile and the half mile that i was going south it was hovering over the river following me. then i turn east bound and it was still following me at that time it was hovering over houses about 15 to 20 feet off the houses. i went east bound for about other half mile maybe then i turn north bound and soon as i turn north bound jetted off so quick that it was gone in a split second.
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription: well take garbage out i noticed a light moving  fast than it slowed going e by se than i saw a jetliner to south as the light slowed and jet got closer the faded out. it had no running lights at all but the jet did the jet was headed north by nw the jet was lower than the light est. alt was about 2 miles up event time was 9:45 lasted 15 to 20 min cst. that is about all can see i was looking up for clouds at the time of the event this not the first i ever seen something in the sky before this just my first report. i was and over the trucker for 9 years .
content.summary: I take garbage out i seen a light moveing  fast than it slowed going e by se than i saw a jetliner to south as the light slowed and jet got closer the faded out. it had no running lights at all but the jet did the jet was headed north by nw the jet

content.detailedDescription: Driving on hwy 75 heading south going to sergeant bluff . just prior to a set of stop lights saw an object that looked on fire above the hillcrest shopping center main building.Thought that it was a hot air balloon but quickly realized the object was too small. i've seen a hot air balloon up close before but this object was too small to be a hot air balloon. then thought it might be a chinese lantern that are lit on the 4th of july that glide in the wind but the object was way too big for that. i pulled into the shopping center and stopped in the parking lot facing the main building's westside wall. i watched it looking from side to side trying to get a better look and judgement of size. i determined that it was about the size of a large commercial size cement truckmixer-the cylinder part that turns. may be a bit bigger. it did not have any sound,no heat, and did not move just hovered. it looked like it was on fire reddish orange on the outside,orange yellow with a little white as if it was super burning hot inside. it appeared to be radiating fire flames but the flames didn't leap off but rather seemed to return or roll back into the center like it was feeding itself. decided to move to get a better look. moved the car into the parking spaces on the north side of the main building.And then it disappeared. i got out and looked straight up to see if it was above me. i looked every direction,clear skies, it was gone.
content.summary: Saw flamelike object above a shopping center building.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside walking the dog with my mom. (we are visiting from new jersey) as soon as we walked out we saw two lights in the sky.I said to my mom what is that! we then saw the object on the right shoot out this light what seemed to be a shooting star.. the object on the right disappeared and a few seconds later the object on the left vanished. i've never seen anything like this in my entire life. i was scared so i pulled my mom and the dog and was speachless. im not sure what we saw but it was not anything ive seen before.
content.summary: Two globe like objects. brightest thing i have ever saw. one seemed to shoot a shooting star.Then they both disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: Las fotos fueron tomadas el pasado 30 de abril 2014 pero no fue hasta el pasado jueves 14 de agosto que al revisarlas vi los objetos en las mismas, se tomaron luego de visitar las ruinas de macchu picchu en cusco perú en vacaciones,por lo que la ubicación es cercana a ésta, no estoy seguro de que hubieran más testigos ya que no escuche a nadie hablar al respecto y como ya describí yo tampoco me percate del objeto hasta revisar las fotos tres meses y medio después, nunca había visto este tipo de luces y viendo la secuencia de imágenes, parecen que se separan hasta quedar tres luces fijas sobre el cielo.
content.summary: Parecen tres objetos muy cercanos muy luminosos y brillantes

content.detailedDescription:
I am a locomotive engineer i have been running trains for 37 years.
i was on a night run.
we just stopped it was just turning day light but the stars where still bright to the south.
 i was looking at the stars when i saw what i to believe to be a satellite because of the speed at which it was moving and it look just like one.
if it had not been moving i would have thought it to be another star.
it was that bright and big. but it stopped then it change its path of travail not once but meany time.
when it stopped it just stayed in the same place it was hovering in place that's why i know it was not a plane and a chopper can not fly that high or that fast. 
it look like they where looking for something, when they stopped it would move to the left then right the forward then back at speeds the a human could not stand. 
i told my conductor to come here you got to see this he was stunned to see what i was seeing.
i told him you just saw your first ufo.
i was shocked i believe there are ufo but i had never seen one in all the years running trains at night. 
i was going to stay there tell i could not see it any more but a train block my view and it turn day light which we could not see it any more as it was in space. 
i was happy too finally see one as do be leave they are out there as we are here.
content.summary: It had to be big

content.detailedDescription:
I was born on 1961, i was young when this event arrived,i think it was before i began to go to school (don't really know the year). it was a hot day, i was in my brother's room, kneeling on the floor, playing  with his littles cars. suddenly, in the corner of my sight on the right (west), i saw very quickly two silhouettes moving rapidly from the window nearby the end of that wall. i jumped on my feet and turn around to see what that was because i felt that was very strange: it was too fast and too silent to be real persons, and what i saw, was not exactly human. then i saw that there's nobody with me in the room (the door was closed). but i know that i really saw something. so, i began to search everywhere in the room: under the two beds, in the closet: nothing. there was a big (for me at this age)chest of drawer placed in front of the window. i was not afraid, just really curious to find out. i was trying to move the chest of drawer to see if they passed by the window when my older brother irrupt in the room, asking me what i was doing. so, i tell him what i saw. he started the research to the window. he showed me that the mosquitoes' net was still attached, so i have to admit that the two silhouette was too fast to open and close that net. after our search in all the room, my brother told me that was just my imagination. but, at that time, i knew what i saw. so after he left the room and close the door again, i began to stay still, watching the right corner of the room. then, slowly, i start to slowly move my self to the right, my eyes wild open. then, i saw them again, still from the corner of my eyes; they were at the same place. then, as they began to move to the right very rapidly, they disappear again from my sight. 
i still began to turn to my right very slowly and then, i saw them again! i was so surprised that i looked at them directly and they disappear! quickly, i turn my eyes to the left to find them and then realize that i can only see them from the corner of my eyes. i tried a couple of times to look at them directly, but i had to look elsewhere if i want to see them. i didn't move anymore, not feeling afraid but too curious and trying to see them better because, they were really not human being. hard to look at them that way, but i really paid attention to them. i noticed that they were looking at me. then, i heard them by telepathy and in my own langage (french) that they seems to be surprise by the fact i could see them. when i heard that, i jumped a little bit, and then again, they noticed that i can ''heard'' them. strangely, they looked surprised again. then, as they started to move fast again, they quickly disappear from my sight. 
i search and search again for them in the room, but never found them. so i return to play with the little cars when suddenly i saw two strange legs and feet by my left side! this time, seems that they autorize me to look at them directly because when i look at him, i just had the time to see a tiny finger pointing to my forehead and heard that strange thing told me: everything will be alright, we will not hurt you (ça va aller, nous ne te ferons aucun mal). as the tiny finger touch very delicatly my forehead, i felt my head falling back and then i was unconscient. at that moment, i was not affraid, but still very curious. 
when i began to awake, the first thing i felt like something, like a medical tube, was slightly going out of my nostril (don't remember right or left). then, i began to open my eyes and i had just the time to saw a little bit that tube. i closed my eyes a little bit ant when i opened them, i was still alone in the room. i stand up and try to look everywhere again, but i found nothing. then i thought that was a dream and return to my little car, but my head full of questions. suddenly, i thought that i felt a fly under my nose and try to chase it with my hand, but when i took my little car, i saw blood on my hand. i was young, so i did what every little kid do when they saw blood, i began to cry and shout at my family trying to tell them what just did happen. my sister cought me on my way out and asked me what happened, but inside me, i knew that if i told them the truth, they won't believe me. so the only thing that went out of my mouth was: i'm bleeding! i'm bleeding! i was looking to my sister and in direction of the room several times. 
many dreams of aliens and spaceship after that. it was also in the time of the tv series ''lost in space''. but i think they put a tag in my head, like we did with the animals. don't know the purpose, but since i'm young, i have health's problems. i also had a head trauma at approximatly that age, so i think that my health's problems may be related to that trauma. 
never saw them again! end of my story... oups! almost forgot, the description of that two visitors: they were about 4 foot 3 inches high (i still have the chest drawer at my home and from what i remember, they were just a little bit higher than that chest). they were like nude, very thin, maybe gray skin because it was not too dark and really not a clear skin ether), dark eyes, direct nostrils in the face and a small mouth. too far away in time, not sure and can't remember more than that.
content.summary: Don't see ufo

content.detailedDescription: Home wife balloon round object at about eleven 20,ooo feet above base noticed it changing position like fluttering saw white beam exstend out and then retract back to ship watched for a little while .
content.summary: Huvering fluttering bright colored lghtes oject inside white beam appeared momentarely .

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to move car into our driveway. looked south at our cat on the fence and my attention was drawn to two very bright red lights traveling slowly but steadily from the south in a nnw direction. 
i watched them for 10 seconds or so before running inside to get my wife and two daughters to have a look to validate what i was looking at. 
the orb like structures seemed to radiate or glow a bright red colour and they made no sound whatsoever as they moved across the sky.
my initial thought was they were satellites as they had the same constant speed observed of satellites on clear nights. i then realised that the sky was very cloudy and that these lights were below the cloud cover. this was proven when the western most light began to gradually be obscured by clouds before disappearing entirely. the other light followed it behind clouds shortly after. both lights could be seen gradually disappearing behind the clouds over a period of a couple of seconds and showed that they were emitting their own light. 
despite scanning the clouds in the area i was unable to see the lights reappear. there was probably 80% cloud cover on the night.
there is an airstrip in ballarat the services small planes and i am very familiar with the sight and sound of these planes. we also have a hospital that occasionally flies helicopters to melbourne so am also familiar with lights and sounds associated with these. these lights were neither.
the distance between them, though impossible to accurately guess, would have meant that it would have to be a very large plane between the two orbs and it would've had to be flying very low and silently.  
as i watched the lights gradually disappear behind the cloud cover there was no structure observed anywhere associated with the orbs. they appeared to be completely independent of each other however flying in absolute unison.
i'm a scientist and can offer no logical explanation for this sighting.
content.summary: 2 red orbs travelling wide apart but parallel, silently

content.detailedDescription:
Just set up the remote camera, was attempting to focus when the 3 objects were seen.
was unable to track them further as the pan tilt was not configured in time

the night footage was taken for 3 consecutive nights after this event, consisting of very large luminious spheres.

on the night of 19/08/2014 at approx 9:18 pm observed a very large discharge of light above my position, could still see what appeared to be a faint star.
fumbling around inside looking for a charge camera and returned outside, felt sure the object would be gone, but to my amazment it sent an exstreamly bright pulse of light out again and still in the same posistion.
i then assumed i had just witnessed a quazar or some type of stellar event and proceeded to point the camera at it, the moment i hit the record it started to move off.
also notice 2 other objects in the footage
file named "the visit"

[links moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Using sony evi ir camera's, witnessed 3 objects with varied paths decend and appeared to land. attempted self visual conformation with bonoculars, but nothing seen

content.detailedDescription: I was parked in my truck about 400 feet just above folsom lake at 9:00 pm july 4th watching all the firework shows across the sacramento valley.At 9:15 i noticed a bright white light across the valley over woodland. it looked like a plane, jet coming towards me.Then a few minutes latter it moved closer to me and higher.Strange thing i never saw it actually move. it had moved about 10 miles closer and 100 feet higher. it looked like it was right above citrus heights.It still looked like a jet heading my way. very white and bright but it never moved.So then i pulled out my binoculars and looked at it. it seamed longer and sideways to the ground. so i pulled out my powerful spotting scope and focused on it. it appeared to be angling sideways and about 30 feet long. as i focused more i could see 7 white lights in a row along the side of it. it just sat there hovering.I new right then i was seeing a ufo. so i picked-up my phone and called my brother in curtis heights. i ask him to look-up in the sky. right then it just disappeared. he never got to see it.
content.summary: Ufo sideways disc 7 white lights on side of it.

content.detailedDescription:
Just came across this video on my newsfeed. everyone seems to be interested in what happens at the 37 second mark, but i am much more interested in what happens at the 44 second mark. am i the only one seeing this? i find it very interesting, i don't think planes fly that fast, maybe i am wrong, but when freeze framed, the object is also intriguing. think it is worth a look!! since there was the initial cloud like object in the same area, around the same time..... 

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: 2 anomalies on news footage, second one does not seem to be noticed by many....
